content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 32, "index": 13}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 4, "index": 18}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 56, "index": 24}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft polished_andesite. Polished_andesite requires placing 4 andesite in a 2x2 crafting grid, therefore I will first need to move the andesite from slot 18 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 32, "index": 13}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 3, "index": 18}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 56, "index": 24}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]

thought: Since the first andesite has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the second andesite to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the second andesite to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 32, "index": 13}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 2, "index": 18}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 56, "index": 24}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I need to move the third andesite below the first andesite. Slot 4 is below slot 1, and therefore I will move the third andesite to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 32, "index": 13}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 56, "index": 24}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: Finally, I need to move the last andesite to the right of the third andesite. Slot 5 is to the right of slot 4, and therefore I will move the last andesite to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 32, "index": 13}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 56, "index": 24}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I can craft the polished_andesite by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
